values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.me: View metadata for files and documents in your Google Drive
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.fi: View and manage Google Drive files that you have opened or created with this app
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive: View and manage the files and documents in your Google Drive
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.re: View the files and documents in your Google Drive
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.sc: Modify your Google Apps Script scripts' behavior
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.in: Special scope used to let users approve installation of an app
values.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.ap: Allows access to the Application Data folder
